item.title: [delta][317] BASIC PREMIUM SYSTEM PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

im using a delta base ive tried over 3 different methods of adding a basic premium system and once i added them in i got a error it was due to this being there

			switch (playerRights) {
			case 20:
				// root admin
				premium = false;
				break;
			case 3:
				// regular admin
				premium = false;
				break;
			case 2:
				// global mod
				premium = false;
				break;
			case 1:
				// player moderator
				premium = false;
				break;
			case 4:
				// just premium
				premium = false;
				break;
			default:
				playerRights = 0;
				premium = false; // false; //bakatool
				break;

if someone could help me would be deeply appreciated

Read full topic
